mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(d.visitDay, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as visitDay, NVL(w.visit_count, 0) AS visitCount FROM (SELECT trunc(sysdate) - level + 1 AS visitDay FROM dual CONNECT BY level <= 7) d LEFT JOIN (SELECT trunc(visitdate) AS visitDay, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM wine_visit WHERE trunc(visitdate) BETWEEN trunc(sysdate - 6) AND trunc(sysdate) AND pageid=#{pageid} GROUP BY trunc(visitdate)) w ON d.visitDay = w.visitDay ORDER BY d.visitDay ASC
